name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-graph-rsc-csharp
title: Resource Specific Consent with Graph API C#
shortDescription: This sample application demonstrates how to request Resource Specific Consent (RSC) permissions, use them to call Microsoft Graph, and enumerate permission grants through a Teams tab.
longDescription: This sample app illustrates the use of Resource Specific Consent (RSC) to access Microsoft Graph APIs, enabling the enumeration of permission grants through a Teams tab. It includes features such as tab integration, RSC permissions, and user interaction for seamless app functionality.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing resource specific consent with graph api c#

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
